p: As with the examples of dietary polyphenols, differences in bioavailability and/or bioactivity may exist within major groups of other phytonutrients. This is an area that needs far greater definition, but in the absence of recommended daily allowances for many phytonutrients, and without universal acceptance of their roles in protecting health, understanding the bioavailability and bioactivity of individual phytonutrients in this type of detail may be a long way off.
